detail_desc: Short, wide top in ribbed jersey with dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Fully lined swimsuit with a deep V-neck and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back.

Padded parka with a lined, faux fur-trimmed hood and a zip with a wind flap and press-studs down the front. Handwarmer pockets, flap front pockets and a small zipped pocket on one sleeve. Inner ribbing at the cuffs. Quilted lining.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Ankle-length trousers in cotton twill with a high, elasticated waist, side pockets, flap leg pockets and tapered legs with elastication at the hems.
Short, wide T-shirt in printed jersey.
Trainers in mesh and imitation leather with a padded edge, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Jersey linings, mesh insoles and chunky soles.
Shortie briefs in soft, organic cotton jersey with a mid waist, lined gusset, low-cut legs and medium coverage at the back.
Slip-on trainers with fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Sports shorts in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with elastication and a decorative drawstring at the waist. Layered over jersey inner leggings.
Vest top in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front, deep armholes and a raw-edge hem.
Thin metal chain necklace with seven pendants in different designs that can be used individually or together Adjustable length 38-46 cm.
Sleeveless dress in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, narrow shoulder straps, a wrapover front with a concealed button and press-stud, and ties at one side. Unlined.

Long-sleeved shirt with a waistcoat and bow tie. Shirt in woven fabric made from a cotton blend with a collar, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs. Waistcoat in a linen and cotton weave with buttons down the front. Patterned bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back.

Dungarees in a soft, patterned organic cotton weave with a frill at the top and straps with adjustable buttoning at the front. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs, and elasticated hems.
Long-sleeved top in jersey with a print motif. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Jacket in soft, thermal fleece with a stand-up collar and zip down the front.
Fine-knit moccasins with soft terry inside, imitation leather trims and soft suede soles.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with a lined gusset.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Push-up bras in microfibre and mesh with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Flared trenchcoat in a cotton weave with a rounded collar, buttons at the top and a loose yoke with a button at one side. Gathered seam at the waist. Lined.
Cropped, V-neck top in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise and narrow shoulder straps.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a collar and hem detail in cotton poplin. Small opening with a button at the back of the neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and press-studs at the sides and crotch.
Short dress in airy, patterned crinkled fabric with a square neckline, long sleeves with gathers at the shoulders, and a smocked seam at the waist. Jersey lining.

Calf-length dress in airy plumeti chiffon with a decorative drawstring and V-shaped opening at the neck and long raglan sleeves. Elasticated seam at the waist and flounces at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Tunic in soft Tencel™ lyocell denim with a collar, button placket and yoke with a pleat at the back. Detachable belt at the waist and long balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
T-shirt in premium cotton jersey.
Jumpsuit in woven fabric with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Low cut and a concealed zip at the back, and straight, wide legs.

Calf-length dress in a softly draping viscose weave with a sheen. V-neck, wrapover top, short, wide raglan sleeves and a concealed zip at the back. Seam at the waist and a skirt with pleats front and back for added width. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Short, fitted dress in a textured bouclé weave with a concealed zip at the back and short sleeves. Fake front pockets with a decorative button and frayed, raw edges around the neckline, sleeves and hem. Unlined.
Popover jacket in a nylon weave with a drawstring hood and large front pocket with a zip. Elasticated cuffs and a drawstring at the hem. Unlined.
Fitted tube top in soft cotton jersey.

Short dress in a crêpe weave with a round neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Smocked seam under the bust and long, wide sleeves with smocking and a small frill trim at the cuffs. Unlined.
Sandals in shimmering metallic imitation leather with transparent block heels and a narrow, adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Imitation leather insoles.
Striped vest top in stretch cotton jersey.
Fitted pyjama top and shorts in soft, ribbed cotton jersey. Top with a lace-trimmed V-neck and narrow, elasticated shoulder straps. Shorts with visible elastication at the waist.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with buttons on one shoulder and long sleeves.
Twill joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist, pleats at the top and a fake fly. Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets, a low crotch and tapered legs.
Patterned swimsuit with a flounced trim at the front that continues along the shoulder straps, and a lined gusset.
Skirt in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), press-stud fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Calf-length skirt in a softly draping jacquard weave with a sheen. High waist with narrow, covered elastication and a gentle flare to the hem. Unlined.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Set with a knitted hat, tube scarf and gloves. The gloves have ribbed cuffs.

Long-sleeved dress in patterned, lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood and press-studs at the top. Kangaroo pocket, ribbing at the cuffs and a straight-cut hem with slits in the sides.
Thong briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and string back.
Blouse in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, gathers at the shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved body in lace and mesh with a V-neck, mesh side sections and press-studs at the crotch. Lined bust.
Shirt in soft washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front, seam at the waist and peplum.
Dress in patterned cotton jersey with elastication and a wide flounce at the top that continues over the shoulders. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Hat in a soft knit with decorative pompoms.
Loose-fitting, 5-pocket jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details, a high waist, low crotch, zip fly and button, and straight legs.
Short-sleeved Best Friend tops in soft jersey with a print motif on the front and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved shirt in soft brushed twill with a small embroidered detail on the chest, buttoned cuffs and a contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs.
Ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and tapered legs. Wide jersey ribbing at the waist for best fit.
Lined, non-wired bikini top with adjustable shoulder straps, cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and a metal fastener at the back.
Longer-style jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Striped jersey T-shirt in a cotton blend.
Fitted vest top in stretch cotton jersey.
Pull-on trousers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Tapered legs with seams at the knees and elasticated hems.

Checked shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat and hanger loop at the back, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Shirt in an airy cotton weave with a turn-down collar, open chest pocket and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with a tab and button and adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Short jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with an open back and ties at the back of the neck. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Ankle-length dress in softly draping chiffon with a V-neck and a vertical, gathered seam for a draped effect. Long, voluminous puff sleeves and wide cuffs with decorative buttons. Concealed zip in one side, an asymmetric seam at the waist and a flared, pleated skirt. Lined.

Dress in a patterned viscose weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, an elasticated seam and decorative bow at the waist, and side pockets. Unlined.

Romper suit in a cotton weave with elastic shoulder straps, frills at the top and elastication at the back. Press-studs at the crotch and down the inside of the legs (not in sizes 1-4Y). Elasticated hems.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with details in imitation suede, a loop at the back, decorative straps and a zip in the side. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 4 cm.
Short shorts in stretch cotton twill with a high waist, pleats and a detachable tie belt. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets, a zip fly with a concealed button and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Sleeveless dress in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Polo shirt in soft cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, short sleeves with narrow ribbed trims, and short slits in the sides.
V-neck blouse in airy cotton with a collar, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long T-shirt in jersey with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
Scarf in a soft rib knit.
Wide jumper in a soft, fine knit with a V-neck, dropped shoulders, straight hem with slits in the sides and ribbing around the cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.

Knee-length, double-breasted trenchcoat in a stretch weave with a wide collar and concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the top. Shoulder tabs with a button, a detachable belt at the waist, side pockets and a single back vent. Recycled polyester lining.

Soft, non-wired bra in microfibre with lace details. Moulded, padded, opening cups with space for nursing pads, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
